Hey!

I'm Mathurin Sekine, a fullstack developer currently open to new opportunities.

Previously, I worked as a frontend developer at Juisci, where I contributed to building and improving their web app. You can learn more about my work there.

I recently earned my diploma in Application Design and Development (Bachelor's level) from Ada Tech School.

My skill set includes frontend technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, as well as backend frameworks such as Express.js and Nest.js. I'm also comfortable using design tools like Figma, and I am capable of contributing to every stage of a project — from concept and UI design to backend architecture and implementation.

If you think I'd be a great fit for your team, feel free to reach out via LinkedIn, Twitter, or email. You can also check out my CV and GitHub for more about my experience and work.

Cheers,
Mathurin Sekine

Projects

Portfolio V2

A refined version of my portfolio, built with improved technical skills post-apprenticeship. Features MDX for content and enhanced accessibility.

Next.js, TypeScript, next-intl, Tailwind CSS, Motion, Vercel

Home Inventory App

A full-stack web app to organize and manage personal belongings in shared homes, with user roles, accessibility-first design, automated deployment, and robust security.

Figma, Next.js, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, Axios, Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL, Express.js, Cypress, Jest, Coolify

Portfolio V1

The first iteration of my personal portfolio, designed to showcase my projects and bilingual content. Focused on clean aesthetics inspired by minimalist websites.

Next.js, next-intl, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Vercel

E-commerce store project

A collaborative school project where teams built a fullstack e-commerce site. I first worked on the frontend design, then transitioned to the backend.

Figma, React Vite, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Express.js
